name: Bemil Coin
description: Bemil is an entertaining game with a Play to Earn feature, in which players can engage in battle modes with each other, build party & clan, explore the minigames and other features of the game in the space & galaxy theme.. Created in the pandemic period, the aim of Bemil is to create a world where people can have fun and make earnings at the same time - two factors that haven' t seemed to be available in these last 2 years.
